format: TypeScript (TSX for React-like JSX syntax with Qwik framework)
description: This file is the main route component for a note management web application's frontend. It manages notes and categories, rendering UI elements, handling user interactions such as creating, editing, deleting, and filtering notes.

methods.name: selectCategory$
methods.description: Handles selection of a category, updating filtered notes based on category and search query.

methods.name: selectNote$
methods.description: Handles selection of a note by ID.

methods.name: updateSearch$
methods.description: Updates the search query and filters notes accordingly.

methods.name: createNote$
methods.description: Creates a new note with a generated ID and current category context.

methods.name: saveNote$
methods.description: Updates current active note's properties and refreshes the filter as needed.

methods.name: moveToCategory$
methods.description: Changes the category of the active note.
